SELECT cate1.id AS "category_id", cate1.name AS "category_name", cate2.id AS "subCategory_id", cate2.name AS "subCategory_name"
FROM article_categories cate1
INNER JOIN article_categories cate2 ON cate1.id = cate2.parent_id
WHERE cate1.parent_id IS NULL
ORDER BY cate1.priority ASC, cate2.priority ASC;
